highlights.title: Kraken led the day with a $1 billion funding round to scale its AI-powered platform for utilities after spinning out from Octopus Energy
highlights.snippet: Kraken raised $1 billion to scale its AI-powered platform for utilities, while Airalo raised $220 million for its borderless eSIM marketplace.

highlights.title: India exports iPhones worth $50 billion under PLI scheme till December 2025
highlights.snippet: Apple Inc, through its manufacturing partners in India, has exported iPhones worth $50 billion until December 2025, marking record performance.

highlights.title: 6 Charts That Show The Big AI Funding Trends Of 2025
highlights.snippet: AI captured 50% of global funding in 2025 with $202.3 billion invested, up 75% year-over-year, with OpenAI valued at $500 billion as most valuable private company ever.

highlights.title: Marissa Mayer's new startup Dazzle raises $8M led by Forerunner's Kirsten Green
highlights.snippet: Former Yahoo CEO launches AI personal assistant startup after shutting down Sunshine, with plans to exit stealth in 2026.

highlights.title: Twitter co-founder Biz Stone and Pinterest co-founder Evan Sharp have raised new funding for a social media app
highlights.snippet: West Co. social media startup helps users plan with intention and capture the reality of their days.

highlights.title: Six new Apple products will launch early this year, here's what's coming - 9to5Mac
highlights.snippet: Apple will launch 14-inch and 16-inch MacBook Pros with M5 Pro and M5 Max early in 2026, along with iPhone 17e and M5 MacBook Air.

highlights.title: AI may not need massive training data after all
highlights.snippet: Johns Hopkins research shows brain-inspired AI designs can mimic human brain activity before training on any data, challenging the data-hungry approach to AI development.
